type.description: The type of the event, always `response.reasoning_summary.done`.

sequence_number.description: The sequence number of the event that was emitted.

item_id.description: The ID of the item that was updated.

output_index.description: The index of the output item that was updated.

summary_index.description: The index of the summary content that was completed.

text.description: The final summary text that was emitted.

title: Response reasoning summary done event
description: A streaming event that indicated a reasoning summary was completed.
